kana: よんばんめにちいさい
example: Tuvalu is the fourth smallest country in the world.
The altitude of the island is only one or two meters.
The sea level is rising because of global warming.
The ocean water will rise and cover the islands.

kana: ちきゅうのおんだんか
example: They asked the people of the world to stop global warming.
Waves washed away the land as the amount of sand decreased.
The White Australia Policy once limited non-European immigration.

kana: ちゅうごくけいのひと
example: There was trouble between British and ethnic Chinese immigrants.
Australia wants to build a society that respects all cultures.
People in the house next to the sea were worried.
